description: The unique ID for every job
name: Run_ID

description: Timestamp at which the error occured
name: Error_Event_Timestamp

description: Number of attributes failed in DQ validation
name: Invalid_Attribute_CNT

description: All attributes separated by '||' failed against DQ rules
name: Error_Description

description: Indicates status of a record, (Open or Closed)
name: Status

description: Timestamp at which the record was inserted
name: Created_Timestamp

description: Timestamp at which record was updated
name: Updated_Timestamp
